website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few concerns, the Aero Advantage is the one to get for younger children and novices weighing under 90 lbs.
pros: Padded handles, enclosed spring, and slip-resistant foot pads add to safety, though a helmet is recommended
cons: Not recommended for kids under 40 lbs

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, well made product - much better than the pogo sticks of my youth. My 8 year old grand daughter quickly mastered it and is now counting her jumps in the hundreds. I plan to order another one for grand daughter number 2 who is five but also had fun using it. Just the right size and super safe. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks as advertised but started breaking apart within the first 3-5 hour of use.
customer_reviews.text: The good: This came in right on time for my 64lbs 10 year old sons birthday and it is the perfect size for him too. The bad: After the first 3 hrs he bounced on it, the shaft started sounding really bad as it had some scratches on it that seemed to be coming from some friction on the inside. It still bounces nicely but also make the scraping sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lasbrey U Nwachukwu

customer_reviews.title: Great change of pace
customer_reviews.text: In these days of electronics its rare to see play thing that children can have so much simple fun, My grandson loves it . It works just as advertised , well made and designed.The company emailed some tips on how it works that were very helpful. Especially how to "spot" the jumpers when the start out. great price for so much fun and change of pace
customer_reviews.author: MAM

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and secure packaging.The pogo stick seems sturdy, well made and very colorful and attractive.I was pleasantly surprised to see it resembled the retro pogo sticks which were made to last. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Frances H.

customer_reviews.title: My 7-year-old loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is the right size for an elementary school kid or a small middle schooler. It gets them outside and moving. Well worth the investment to see my kids having fun defying gravity.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rousse

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren both love their Pogo sticks!
customer_reviews.text: What a delight to see an old toy come back....or at least we're just seeing it now with our two grandchildren, brother and sister, asking for their own Pogo stick for Christmas. They both love the outdoors and this is an added activity to keep them occupied while having fun outside.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Just The Ticket to Bounce!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 7 yr old son for Christmas. He LOVES it and uses it regularly. It’s holding up to tons and tons of bouncing, being dropped, etc. with no issue. I believe it will continue to entertain and burn energy for a few years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description
customer_reviews.text: We were disappointed when my daughter went to use this the first time it the spring seemed very loose and she could actually bottom the pogo stick out. We bought this one because it says in the title that it is rated up to 90 pounds. When I went to look at the instruction manual, it states that the weight goes up to 80 pounds. Very disappointed with the inaccurate description. Now, we have an almost unusable product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 year old son who had requested one for Christmas. He had never used one before and was a little discouraged at first but a day later he was bouncing for 10 minutes straight! Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: bri

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson who turned 8 yrs. He loves it! He's not a big kid, but it didn't take long for it to loosen up for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old son loves this. Got it for him for Christmas and he was out all day on it. Got the hang of it real quick. For reference, he only weighs 45lbs. And handled this pogo stick beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: LeanneMarie

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: my sons is 10 years old - yes, small framed. weighs about 65 pounds. been playing with it for a few months. sometime pretty aggressively - very durable. construction is good, quality is good, perfect as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and not damaged. I’m very pleased. Small enough for my 5 year old granddaughter. She needs a little help right now, but packaging states it will take some time for the spring to loosen. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Malinda

customer_reviews.title: Grinding noises
customer_reviews.text: This stick immediately made scratching and grinding noises and never really worked. Will be returning in order to get another brand
customer_reviews.author: ashlie

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite new toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son for his birthday. He loves this pogo stick! He learned how to use it within a couple of days, within a week he was doing tricks. "Best birthday gift ever".
customer_reviews.author: ShaG1229

customer_reviews.title: This was fun for my 8 year old for a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: This was fun for my 8 year old for a couple weeks, but it has started to wear down very quickly. Not great for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Reagan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pogo stick. My daughter loves it. Made well! Good price.
customer_reviews.author: 2xMom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this gift! It was his favorite Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: So glad I ordered this for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 8 y/o grandson for Christmas and he loves it. He is constantly jumping on it and having so much fun. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mopsy5

customer_reviews.title: Very good.
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of fund but a bit hard to use at the beginning for a 7-year old boy. However, the spring gets softer with time (and usage).
customer_reviews.author: Paolo Mignatti

customer_reviews.title: My son is a good 15 lbs under the max weight and he hits ...
customer_reviews.text: Max weight is high. My son is a good 15 lbs under the max weight and he hits the bottom hard. This would be great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Mjanaynay

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My nine-year-old son LOVES this!! I thought it would be too stiff but it is perfect. He has reached 500 jumps!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bowen

customer_reviews.title: My great grandson seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: My great grandson seems to like it. Will take some practice to operate it properly but I think it's going to be a good "outdoor" toy for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: Nine year old grandson loves this pogo stick and is good on it.margie
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: Its sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves everything about this. We gave it to her as a christmas gift and shes jumping on it ever day. Its sturdy and the part that i like about it is that it has good rubber grip on the handle bars and on the bottom of the stick vs others. It also dosent squeek when jumping.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Best pogo stick for ,my son. Bought a second one for my daughter. Recommend!,
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my 8 year old that absolutely loves it. The padding is a great addition.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Needs oil to work properly...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a birthday present for my son. He was disappointed to learn that it was very difficult to bounce with this brand new pogo stick. It requires oil and applied often. Otherwise, every time he jumps it is metal on metal grinding which makes it difficult to work and super loud.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lily John

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday present for a grandson. Surprised he asked for a Pogo stick. He loves it! Well made, arrived on time and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Snedecor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and lots of fun... Bought this for my 6 year old 45lb daughter and she caught on quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken during the first use.
customer_reviews.text: Had to pick a star to write a review, I tried none. On the 21st bounce the pogo stick stopped working. The child on the pogo stick was not even close to the maximum weight. The spring no longer functioned. Tough afternoon after opening the gift and trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Battershell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Son LOVED his pogo stick. Great quality, and was delivered a day early!
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Quality issues
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved this pogo stick for two months, until it started jamming every 5 or 6 jumps, rendering it unusable and dangerous. The pogo stick only lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: That he loves it/
customer_reviews.text: Well, I haven't given it to my grandson but it looks great and seems just the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Gingie

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son loves it. Very study and made well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr old loves it! I can’t keep him off the thinf
customer_reviews.author: ajf9872

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy.. 3 kids have used it so far. 7-9 year olds
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages it recomends
customer_reviews.text: Wished we would have bought two. It works soo much better than the other one. Spring is easier to work
customer_reviews.author: Gramma joyce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pogo sticks and the kids immediately loved them!! Great gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: John T Marley

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 10 year old niece for Christmas, she loved it and enjoy it very much.
customer_reviews.author: W.Flores

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. Bought for my son for his birthday and two days later it was sticking and not bouncing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a sturdy 6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I have to spot him but my 6 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Vishnesky

customer_reviews.title: Great get for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 10 year old son - he’s obsessed with it !! Nice and durable works great
customer_reviews.author: K.Trimmer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter--her response to getting and using it was "AWESOME!"...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter took right to it her and friends loved it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Wurm

customer_reviews.title: Best toy for outside activity
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item as a gift and it was met with great enthusiasm!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: My son chose to purchase this for his 7th birthday and he hasn’t put it down since he received it. Everything is as described. Will order one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: The spring stayed stiff after one day of use.
customer_reviews.text: The spring is very stiff for a 45 lb. 5 year old girl.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Zarza

customer_reviews.title: Fun times ahead
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my 7 yr old grandson who is very active!
customer_reviews.author: Devie

customer_reviews.title: It is a real nice one. My great grandson is really enjoying it
customer_reviews.text: It arrived here when they said it would. It is a real nice one. My great grandson is really enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Martinia Burdine

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: When my son received this pogo stick as a Christmas gift this past year, I thought it looked like a great brand and product! However, within 5 uses, the spring broke and it is no longer usable. At 62 pounds, he is well within the weight limit. Such a shame, but I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dornbush

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great Toy for a 7 Year Old. I read that it is firm to get started, but it has been going strong since he got the hang of it the first day. My husband even ran over the tip (where it hits the ground) but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: N. King

customer_reviews.title: someone of a larger size tried and it worked much better. I would not suggest for a light weight ...
customer_reviews.text: my son is 6 and struggles with this because of the spring being so tight! someone of a larger size tried and it worked much better. I would not suggest for a light weight 6 year old but it does work great for someone of a larger size that is roughly 7-8. my son does use it but still struggles and I think he will until he gets a little heavier
customer_reviews.author: Jessica McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a great toy for kids. My kids were so excited to get this
customer_reviews.author: Katie benway

product_meta.title: Pogo Stick for Kids - Aero Advantage - for Kids 5,6,7,8,9,10 Years Old & Up to 90lbs (36kgs) - Awesome Fun Quality Pogo Stick for Boys & Girls by ThinkGizmos
product_meta.description:
The ThinkGizmos Aero Advantage Is The Best Pogo Stick For Kids - Excellent Quality Construction and Made To Last. 

At ThinkGizmos we have been selling Pogo Sticks worldwide for almost 20 years and this Aero Advantage model is the latest in our range aimed at younger kids. The Aero Advantage Pogo Stick is our modern adaptation of the classic pogo stick toy and is built for performance, safety and stunning looks. 

Incorporates concealed Low Friction Spring technology for a quiet, smooth and higher bounce due to Industrial strength steel springs. This awesome stick is perfect for improving back and core strength and physical timing. 

The Aero Advantage Pogo Stick will keep your kids active and burning a lot of energy, and all while they are having an awesome amount of fun. Win Win! This pogo stick for boys and girls is a tried and tested device used by kids around the world for decades. Get your kids off the computer and jumping on a pogo ace pogo stick. Please always read and follow the included safety manual at all times. 

The Pogo Advantage Pogo Stick for kids should only be used on flat, solid surface to avoid the risk of falling. Please always use a helmet (not included) for safety reasons. 

Overall this Pogo Advantage model is perfect for users up to 90lbs (36kgs) mainly younger children 5-12 years old and is impressivein its build quality, performance and looks. 

If you are want a pogo stick model for older kids or adults, check out the "Aero Legend Pogo" model also sold on Amazon 

This is a ThinkGizmos branded product. ThinkGizmos is a registered trademark in the USA
feature_bullets: ✔️ AWESOME DESIGN: An impressive jumping stick for children. The ideal jumping stick for boys and girls who are 5 to 10 years old, who weigh 40lbs-90lbs (18 kg to 36 kg). The latest design of the Aero Advantage model for even better performance and beautiful appearance.
✔️ SAFETY FIRST: The Aero Advantage from Think Gizmos comes complete with non-slip pedals and a safety foam handle. Please always use a helmet (not included) for safety reasons.

✔️ BUILT TO LAST: This jumping stick for boys and girls is covered in foam and very well built (Do not be persuaded by cheap models that will break easily). Incorporates a powerful low friction spring for improved performance.

✔️ KEEP ACTIVE: The rubber tip will help maintain control, keep kids jumping and active for a long time. This jumping stick for children measures approximately 37 inches (94cm) tall / width 8.5 inches (21cm).

✔️ PLAY & DEVELOP: An awesome way for children to develop skills, improve balance and concentration, have fun and regain shape, enjoy outdoors and improve their confidence all whilst having a great time playing.
